content.en_us:
An [[external heat source|External Heat Source]] powered by electricity. Needs to be configured with a screwdriver.

Due to the first law of thermodynamics, boiling water with an electric heater will produce less energy than is used to create it.
content.zh_cn:
一种由电力供能的[[外部热源|External Heat Source]]，
需要用螺丝刀配置。由于热力学第一定律，
用电加热器烧水发电产生的电力会少于烧水消耗的电力。
